verses.verse: Of the children of Ammon. <WH1121> Thus says <WH559> Yahweh: <WH3068> Has Israel <WH3478> no sons? <WH1121> has he no heir? <WH3423> why then does Malcam <WH4428> possess <WH3423> Gad, <WH1410> and his people <WH5971> dwell <WH3427> in its cities? <WH5892>

Of Edom. <WH123> Thus says <WH559> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies: <WH6635> Is wisdom <WH2451> no more in Teman? <WH8487> is counsel <WH6098> perished <WH6> from the prudent? <WH995> is their wisdom <WH2451> vanished? <WH5628>

If grape gatherers <WH1219> came <WH935> to you, <WH7604> would they not leave some gleaning grapes? <WH5955> if thieves <WH1590> by night, <WH3915> wouldn't <WH7843> they destroy until they had enough? <WH1767>

But I have made Esau <WH6215> bare, <WH2834> I have uncovered <WH1540> his secret places, <WH4565> and he shall not be able <WH3201> to hide <WH2247> himself: <WH2233> his seed is destroyed, <WH7703> and his brothers, <WH251> and his neighbors; <WH7934> and he is no more.

For thus says <WH559> Yahweh: <WH3068> Behold, <WH4941> they to whom it didn't pertain to drink <WH8354> of the cup <WH3563> shall certainly <WH8354> drink; <WH8354> and are you he who shall altogether <WH5352> go unpunished? <WH5352> You shall not go unpunished, <WH5352> but you shall surely <WH8354> drink. <WH8354>

The earth <WH776> trembles <WH7493> at the noise <WH6963> of their fall; <WH5307> there is a cry, <WH6818> the noise <WH6963> which is heard <WH8085> in the Red <WH5488> Sea. <WH3220>
